mapper.insert: insert into plan_list_tbl(plan_name, username, posotion_code, plan_regdate, plan_startdate, plan_enddate, plan_objective, plan_state, plan_proposal) values(#{plan_name}, #{username}, #{posotion_code}, #{plan_regdate} ,#{plan_startdate} , #{plan_enddate}, #{plan_objective}, #{plan_state}, #{plan_proposal})
